FuncDef: The display issu isolated board command displays information about isolated boards during an ISSU.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If upgrading a board fails during an ISSU, you can isolate this board and enable the system to continue upgrading other boards. The fault can be located and rectified after you upgrade all the other boards in the system. To view information about the isolated board, run the display issu isolated board command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
